title: Statute of limitations on medical debt California? I never paid and disputed balance.
question: When does the time start and finish on this. Date of service, discharge from hospital, etc.
answers: Starts from when payment was due, but was not made. 4 years from then.
I suggest contacting a consumer litigation lawyer that deals with the FCRA and/or debt collection defense.

If the service debt was performed in California, the statute of limitations for breach of written contract is 4 years from date of breach, or 4 years from date of the last payment, whichever is later. Keep in mind the statute of limitations does not mean they cannot sue you but rather it is to be used as a defense if you are sued.
